    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the server and creates new client handlers for new clients.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Ensures
        Server is started with given port number as a local host, new client hander is started on a new thread for each new client

      • setup

        public void setup()
           throws ExitProgram
        Sets up a Internet connection on local host with a port number thats being asked.
        Throws:
        ExitProgram - - when the server wants to exit
        Ensures
        A connection is created or the client wants to shutdown

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient​(CollectoClientHandler handler)
        If client disconnects it should be removed from the lists.
        Parameters:
        handler - - the ClientHandler that should be removed
        Requires
        handler != null;
        Ensures
        That the client is removed everywhere

      • handleHello

        public void handleHello​(CollectoClientHandler handler)
                 throws ClientUnavailableException
        Handles the hello send by a client by replying: HELLO~"serverName".
        Parameters:
        handler - - The client handler that sent the hello to the server
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Ensures
        the hello send back is to the same client that send hello in the first place, message is sent to client according the protocol

      • handleLogin

        public void handleLogin​(java.lang.String clientInput,
                        CollectoClientHandler handler)
                 throws ClientUnavailableException
        Handles the login send by a client by adding it to all the online users and to the client.
        Parameters:
        clientInput - - the message after the login command (thus the loginName)
        handler - - The client handler that sent the login request to the server
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Ensures
        if user name already exists, ALREADYLOGGEDIN is sent to client, if user name is unique, LOGIN is sent to client and new user name is added and handler.userName = user name, message is sent to client according the protocol

      • handleQueue

        public void handleQueue​(CollectoClientHandler handler)
                 throws ClientUnavailableException
        Handles the queue send by the client by adding or removing it from the queue, also checks if game can be played.
        Parameters:
        handler - - The client handler that sent the login request to the server
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Ensures
        if client is already in queue, it is removed from it., if client is not in queue, it is added to it, also is checked if there are now 2 players in queue so a game can be played, the role of player is picked randomly.

      • doNewGame

        public void doNewGame​(CollectoClientHandler hdler1,
                      CollectoClientHandler hdler2)
               throws ClientUnavailableException
        Starts a new Collecto game with the clients given in the parameters.
        Parameters:
        hdler1 - - The first client waiting in the queue
        hdler2 - - The second client waiting in the queue
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Ensures
        the created board is sent to both clients and both names are added, message is sent to client according the protocol

      • handleMove

        public void handleMove​(java.lang.String clientInput,
                       CollectoClientHandler handler)
                throws ClientUnavailableException
        Handles the move sent by the client.
        Parameters:
        clientInput - - the move(s) the client wants to make separated with the delimiter
        handler - - The client that made the move request
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Requires
        clientInput != null;, handler != null;

      • handleCorrectMove

        public void handleCorrectMove​(int[] choice,
                              CollectoServerGame game)
                       throws ClientUnavailableException
        Handles the correct choice of client and apply to the game.
        Parameters:
        choice - - the move(s) the client
        game - - The client's current game
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Requires
        choice != null;, game != null;
        Ensures
        doGameOver if (game.getBoard.isEndGame() == true);

      • doGameOver

        public void doGameOver​(CollectoClientHandler handler1,
                       CollectoClientHandler handler2,
                       java.lang.String reason,
                       java.lang.String name)
                throws ClientUnavailableException
        When a game is ended, this method should be called to notify the clients.
        Parameters:
        handler1 - - The handler you want to send the message to
        handler2 - - The handler you want to send the message to
        reason - - The reason why the game is over
        name - - The name of the player that won the game (empty in case of draw)
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Requires
        handler1 is the one who is still connecting, reason.equals(ProtocolMessages.DRAW) || reason.equals(ProtocolMessages.DISCONECTED) || reason.equals(ProtocolMessages.VICTORY)
        Ensures
        message is sent to client according the protocol

      • doMove

        public void doMove​(int move1,
                   int move2,
                   CollectoClientHandler handler1,
                   CollectoClientHandler handler2)
            throws ClientUnavailableException
        Sends the updated move(s) in the game to both clients in the game.
        Parameters:
        move1 - - The first move made
        move2 - - The second move made (-1 if it was a single move)
        handler1 - - client 1 of the game
        handler2 - - client 2 of the game
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Requires
        move1 to be a valid move and move2 to be -1 or a valid move
        Ensures
        message is sent to client according the protocol, the move made is sent to both clients

      • handleList

        public void handleList​(CollectoClientHandler handler)
                throws ClientUnavailableException
        Handles the list request from the client.
        Parameters:
        handler - - The ClientHandler that did the request
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Ensures
        all clients that are logged in are included in the list, message is sent to client according the protocol

      • doError

        public void doError​(java.lang.String errorMessage,
                    CollectoClientHandler handler)
             throws ClientUnavailableException
        Sends a error message to the client.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - - the message that you want the client to know
        handler - - The clientHandler you want to send the message to
        Throws:
        ClientUnavailableException - - if connection between server and client failed
        Requires
        errorMessage != null;, handle != null;
        Ensures
        message is sent to client according the protocol

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starts a new server with the port number given in the arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - - the Arguments added when running
